doc.title: okukola pulogulaamu
doc.description: Ekitundu kino kikwata ku ngeri yâ€™okukolamu pulogulaamu

example1.title: {{0}}Ekyokulabirako kya koodi y'olupapula lw'awaka
example1.annotation1: Salawo oba lye linnya lye limu ery'ekifo ekisookerwako Bwe kitaba bwe kityo, zzaayo {{0}} era tokyakola.
example1.annotation2: Salawo oba ye {{0}} oba omukutu gwayo ogutandikira ku kabonero @ Bwe kiba bwe kityo, zzaayo {{1}}.
example1.annotation3: Salawo oba lupapula lwa vidiyo lutandikira ku /watch Bwe kiba bwe kityo, {{0}} ejja kuddizibwa.
example1.annotation4: Salawo oba lupapula lwa vidiyo olumpi ekkubo lyayo litandikira ku /shorts/ Bwe kiba bwe kityo, {{0}} ejja kuddizibwa.
